column5: - these rigs are fine providing that total hook count doesnt exceed 4:http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/en/Business...OD_097331.html
I wonder if you can jig walleyes with one of these?
Why not...shorten the lead so as to avoid tangles. Personaly I see utility in a trolling scenario using a downrigger in the late summer/fall. Bass fisherman cast em with heavier action rods.
Wow, being able to run four cranks with a single treble hook on each!I never thought that would be legal in Ontario.
